name: 霍弘毅
objective: Students will review the basic rules for and mechanics of the sentence.  We will proceed set-by-step from Parts of Speech and Function in the sentence to Phrases to Clauses to Sentences to Paragraphs to a short Essay.  The elements of Grammar will be our guide to constructing Phrases, and Clauses; Grammatically Phrases and Clauses in turn will become the elements of sentence Style.  By the end of the course students will have the tools needed to edit one’s own English and the tools to produce a variety of Sentence types.
scorePolicy:
